title: Implement Widget Library UI Component
description:
Create the frontend widget library component that displays available widgets (My Tasks, Recent Activity, Priority Breakdown, Search, System Health) with visual previews and add buttons.

Acceptance Criteria:
1. Widget library displays all 5 required widget types with visual previews
2. Each widget has descriptive title and brief description
3. Add button for each widget that integrates with dashboard state management
4. Responsive design that works on mobile and desktop
5. Empty state messaging when no widgets are available
6. Widgets can be filtered/searched within the library
7. Component integrates with existing dashboard state from dashboard.ts
